title: These Luxury Swimsuit Brands Will Have You Dreaming Up Your Next Vacation
description: The sunny season can’t get here soon enough.
excerpt: The sunny season can’t get here soon enough.
text: If the recent time change and the resulting sunsets have you dreaming of a vacation, you’re not alone—the potential cure to your seasonal depression is (literally) on the horizon. And what better way to motivate yourself to book that flight and hotel? A chic new swimsuit from one of the best luxury swimwear brands, perfect for elevating your getaway.Like anything, having the right ensemble can really put you in the mood for whatever’s in the cards—that’s why I’ve compiled the best brands on the market, which are sure to get your warm-weather days off to the right start. And while we don’t suggest getting rid of your tried-and-true Amazon swimsuits, a designer swimsuit is the perfect complement to those new beach sandals you just bought. (We won’t blame you if you’re inspired to throw a new coverup or summer dress in your cart, either.) Don’t worry, the best swimwear brands range in style and price, so you know there will be one made just for you. Shop these editor-approved styles for a successful swimsuit season, below. Isa BoulderBased in Bali, Isa Boulder is known for its innovative takes on classic strappy bikinis and bathing suits. The label’s suits are made from eco-friendly fabric and feature unique cutouts, guaranteed to be unlike any other piece of swimwear in your closet. And when you’re not at the beach or pool, slip into a piece of the brand’s flattering knitwear.Price range: $$$Best for: Those wanting something unexpected Isa Boulder Purple Papillon & Shy Thong BikiniIsa Boulder Double-chain Bikini Top Isa Boulder Brown V Knot & Avril BikiniIsa Boulder Silver Astoria Chain Bikini J.Crew The preppy fashion mainstay also does swim, and yes, it’s just as good as its ready-to-wear. J.Crew’s feminine designs feature prints in a variety of silhouettes and sometimes come with matching beachwear and accessories, as well. You can mix and match easily, creating a swimwear collection you’ll have for years to come. Price range: $-$$Best for: Tried-and-true basicsJ.Crew Tie-front Halter One-pieceJ.Crew Claudia O-ring Scrunchie Bikini TopJ.Crew Lettuce-trim String Bikini TopJ.Crew Ruched One-shoulder One-pieceAgua by Agua BenditaFounded by Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, two best friends who started the company over two decades ago in Medellín, Colombia, Agua by Agua Bendita is a dream come true for those vacationing. Simply put, their brand’s swimsuits are stunning, adorned with pretty details like floral appliqués and come in super-feminine silhouettes. Price range: $$$Best for: Dainty, vacation-ready designs Agua by Agua Bendita Kiwi Embroidered Bikini TopNow 25% OffAgua by Agua Bendita Ilusión Floral Embroidered SwimsuitAgua by Agua Bendita Olmo Mosqueta Bikini TopAgua by Agua Bendita Ébano Bougainvillea One-Piece Swimsuit Beach RiotWith its founder hailing from Southern California, you know Beach Riot’s swimwear is designed with the laidback lifestyle in mind. Its swimsuits come in a variety of styles, making them perfect for those who would love having something simple, like a classic black one-piece, and something a little different, like a crochet bikini. Price range: $$Best for: Everyday swimwearBeach Riot Dallas TopBeach Riot Andy TopBeach Riot Beach Riot Reese One PieceNow 62% OffBeach Riot Kelsey Bikini Top ReformationThe cult-favorite brand’s brand does not disappoint. Ranging from bikinis to one-pieces, there is a Reformation swimsuit you’re bound to fall in love with, guaranteed. Reformation also has silhouettes reminiscent of its beloved dresses. So, if you love the label’s aesthetic, its swimwear that needs to be on your radar.Price range: $$Best for: Eye-catching, new swimwear Reformation Maldives Bikini TopReformation Posidonia One Piece SwimsuitReformation Kauaii Bikini TopReformation Joy One Piece SwimsuitERESWhen you want something truly elevated, a swimsuit from French design studio ERES is what you should be buying. These pieces come in classic styles and simple colorways in addition to being big on quality—just what you need when investing in a swimsuit you’ll have forever.Price range: $$$$Best for: Simple, elevated swimwearERES Mouna Triangle Bikini TopEres Aquarelle One-Piece Swimsuit with Thin StrapsEres Show Bandeau Bikini TopERES Glamorous Sophisticated V-Neck One-Piece Swimsuit Farm RioIf you know Farm Rio, you’re familiar with the Brazilian brand’s fun prints and bright colors adorning almost every article of clothing they sell, including its swimwear. So, when you want to feel like you’re on the ultimate tropical getaway, you can do no wrong with the beloved brand. Its suits are perfect to mix and match, providing you with endless options for your getaway and beyond.Price range: $$Best for: Subtle stylesMIKOH Kaloko Bikini Top MIKOH Copa Bikini TopMIKOH Kea One PieceMIKOH Loki Bikini Top PeonyEnvironmentally friendly swimwear is at the heart of Peony’s feminine and flattering designs. With subtle patterns and styles, the swimsuits are both beautiful and sophisticated. They also pair well with the brand’s resort pieces, which makes it a stunning line worth checking out.Price range: $$Best for: Sophisticated selects Peony Solstice Floral Bikini TopNow 25% OffPeony Memoir Embroidered One-Piece Swimsuit Now 25% OffPeony Everlasting Triangle Bikini TopNow 25% OffPeony Holiday Balconette Bikini TopNow 25% Off Victoria’s SecretVictoria’s Secret swimsuits have been a mainstay for good reason—and they just keep getting better. The brand’s latest styles incorporate trendy fabrics and modern silhouettes while still maintaining the same brand identity that shoppers have come to love.Price range: $-$$Best for: Faithful swimwear lovers Victoria’s Secret Essential Monokini One-Piece SwimsuitVictoria’s Secret VS Archives Essential Ruffled Halter Bikini TopVictoria’s Secret Crinkle Racerback One-Piece SwimsuitVictoria’s Secret Essential Plunge Bikini TopReina OlgaA favorite of ELLE.com senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong, Reina Olga is an Italian swimwear line with updated takes on traditional swimsuits. Born from an idea from sisters Guia and Isotta, the line is fun yet chic—the perfect combination for a swimsuit.Price range: $$-$$$Best for: Updated reinventions Reina Olga La Volpe Bikini SetReina Olga Augusta Ribbed Cut-out SwimsuitReina Olga Laila Crinkle One-Piece SwimsuitReina Olga Triangle-Cup Bikini Now 17% OffMatteauKnown for its modern takes on timeless swimwear styles, Matteau’s suits are flattering, comfortable, and made to last. The brand, from founded by sisters Peta Heinsen and Ilona Hamer, also sells elevated, classic clothing perfect for pairing with its swimsuits on a warm vacation day.Price range: $$-$$$Best for: Modern minimalism Matteau Black Tri Crop Bikini TopMatteau Scoop-back One-piece SwimsuitMatteau The String Floral-print Recycled Triangle Bikini TopMatteau The Square SwimsuitSAMEFounded in 2015 by Shea Marie, the California-based brand is known for its delicate and chic swimsuits. Often featuring details like stripes, rosettes, and other appliqués, these swimsuits know how to make a statement. Price range: $$$Best for: Floral appliqués and rosettesSAME Spiral Halter One PieceSAME Spiral Bikini TopSAME Floral-Appliqué SwimsuitSAME Layered Bikini TopOceanusHarkening back to the maximalist glamour of the ’80s, Oceanus is all about jewels, gems, and bedazzlement. If you’re going out in the sun, you might as well sport something that shines, right? All items are made with environmentally friendly textiles with hand-embroidered Swarovski crystals. That’s swimwear you can brag about.Price range: $$$Best for: Beachy glitz and glamourOceanus Los Angeles Underwire Beaded Bikini TopNow 25% OffOceanus Alabama Embellished One-Piece SwimsuitNow 25% OffOceanus Beatrix Sunburst 2-Piece Swim Skirt Set Now 25% OffOceanus Heidi Beaded Underwire Bikini TopNow 25% OffZimmermannIt’s never too early to start collecting resort-ready swimwear. Zimmerman mastered the out-of-office aesthetic in its swim line, abundant with feminine florals, soft colors, and delicate crochet.Price range: $$$Best for: Vacation-worthy printsZimmermann Maxine Tie Detail Two-Piece Swimsuit Zimmermann Tallow Lace Triangle BikiniZimmermann Maxine Paisley Belted Bandeau One-Piece SwimsuitZimmermann Acacia Floral Triangle Bikini SetFrankies BikinisIf you’re looking for an on-trend style, Frankies Bikinis is where it’s at. It ticks off all the Instagram-favorite hits like tie-dye, cloud prints, terry cloth, and more.Price range: $$Best for: Must-have swimsuit trendsFrankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Angel Bikini TopFrankies Bikinis Juliet Cheeky One Piece SwimsuitFrankies Bikinis x BELLA HADID Nick Triangle Bikini TopFrankies Bikinis Cola Underwire Bikini Top OséreeFounded by Jannine Vinci and Isabella Cavalli in 2015, Oséree is an Italian swimwear brand that gets its name from the French verb “oser,” meaning “to dare.” Thus, it’s no surprise that sparkly maillots and two-pieces are the brand’s signatures. If your vibe skews “extra,” its fringy beaded styles are most definitely for you.Price range: $$$Best for: Glittery, shimmery momentsOséree Rose-appliqué BikiniOséree Oséree Shade bikini setOséree Sporty Bra 90s BikiniOséree Striped BikiniAerieAerie makes some of the most flattering swimwear that never, ever falls off. Seriously, one can wipe out while surfing, and its two-piece bikinis somehow stay in place as you’re rocked by a huge wave.Price range: $Best for: Sporty, size-inclusive, comfortable (and affordable) piecesAerie Cloudweave Crochet Voop Bikini TopNow 56% OffAerie The Boardwalker Ribbed Bikini TopNow 25% OffAerie The Surfer One Piece SwimsuitNow 25% OffAerie The Dipper Bikini TopNow 46% OffBond-EyeWith a single-size sizing model (the brand’s technical fabric generally fits sizes from XS to L), Bond-Eye might not be for everyone. But those who are in the know know. The material is super flattering and ranges from chic neutrals to fun color-blocking that will make you feel like an ’80s Barbie in the best way possible.Price range: $$Best for: Punchy, flattering stylesBond-Eye Indi Reversible Triangle TopBond-Eye Maxam One PieceBond-Eye Ring Scout Crop Crinkle Bikini TopBond-Eye Tie Back Blake Crinkle Bandeau Bikini TopNow 51% OffMissoniA Missoni zigzag swimsuit is the Rolls-Royce of bikinis. html:
If the recent time change and the resulting sunsets have you dreaming of a vacation, you’re not alone—the potential cure to your seasonal depression is (literally) on the horizon. And what better way to motivate yourself to book that flight and hotel? A chic new swimsuit from one of the best luxury swimwear brands, perfect for elevating your getaway.

Like anything, having the right ensemble can really put you in the mood for whatever’s in the cards—that’s why I’ve compiled the best brands on the market, which are sure to get your warm-weather days off to the right start. And while we don’t suggest getting rid of your tried-and-true Amazon swimsuits, a designer swimsuit is the perfect complement to those new beach sandals you just bought. (We won’t blame you if you’re inspired to throw a new coverup or summer dress in your cart, either.)

Don’t worry, the best swimwear brands range in style and price, so you know there will be one made just for you. Shop these editor-approved styles for a successful swimsuit season, below.

Isa Boulder

Based in Bali, Isa Boulder is known for its innovative takes on classic strappy bikinis and bathing suits. The label’s suits are made from eco-friendly fabric and feature unique cutouts, guaranteed to be unlike any other piece of swimwear in your closet. And when you’re not at the beach or pool, slip into a piece of the brand’s flattering knitwear.

Price range:

$$$

Best for: Those wanting something unexpected

Isa Boulder Purple Papillon & Shy Thong Bikini

Isa Boulder Double-chain Bikini Top

Isa Boulder Brown V Knot & Avril Bikini

Isa Boulder Silver Astoria Chain Bikini

J.Crew

The preppy fashion mainstay also does swim, and yes, it’s just as good as its ready-to-wear. J.Crew’s feminine designs feature prints in a variety of silhouettes and sometimes come with matching beachwear and accessories, as well. You can mix and match easily, creating a swimwear collection you’ll have for years to come.

Price range: $-$$

Best for: Tried-and-true basics

J.Crew Tie-front Halter One-piece

J.Crew Claudia O-ring Scrunchie Bikini Top

J.Crew Lettuce-trim String Bikini Top

J.Crew Ruched One-shoulder One-piece

Agua by Agua Bendita

Founded by Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, two best friends who started the company over two decades ago in Medellín, Colombia, Agua by Agua Bendita is a dream come true for those vacationing. Simply put, their brand’s swimsuits are stunning, adorned with pretty details like floral appliqués and come in super-feminine silhouettes.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Dainty, vacation-ready designs

Agua by Agua Bendita Kiwi Embroidered Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Agua by Agua Bendita Ilusión Floral Embroidered Swimsuit

Agua by Agua Bendita Olmo Mosqueta Bikini Top

Agua by Agua Bendita Ébano Bougainvillea One-Piece Swimsuit

Beach Riot

With its founder hailing from Southern California, you know Beach Riot’s swimwear is designed with the laidback lifestyle in mind. Its swimsuits come in a variety of styles, making them perfect for those who would love having something simple, like a classic black one-piece, and something a little different, like a crochet bikini.

Price range: $$

Best for: Everyday swimwear

Beach Riot Dallas Top

Beach Riot Andy Top

Beach Riot Beach Riot Reese One Piece

Now 62% Off

Beach Riot Kelsey Bikini Top

Reformation

The cult-favorite brand’s brand does not disappoint. Ranging from bikinis to one-pieces, there is a Reformation swimsuit you’re bound to fall in love with, guaranteed. Reformation also has silhouettes reminiscent of its beloved dresses. So, if you love the label’s aesthetic, its swimwear that needs to be on your radar.

Price range: $$

Best for: Eye-catching, new swimwear

Reformation Maldives Bikini Top

Reformation Posidonia One Piece Swimsuit

Reformation Kauaii Bikini Top

Reformation Joy One Piece Swimsuit

ERES

When you want something truly elevated, a swimsuit from French design studio ERES is what you should be buying. These pieces come in classic styles and simple colorways in addition to being big on quality—just what you need when investing in a swimsuit you’ll have forever.

Price range: $$$$

Best for: Simple, elevated swimwear

ERES Mouna Triangle Bikini Top

Eres Aquarelle One-Piece Swimsuit with Thin Straps

Eres Show Bandeau Bikini Top

ERES Glamorous Sophisticated V-Neck One-Piece Swimsuit

Farm Rio

If you know Farm Rio, you’re familiar with the Brazilian brand’s fun prints and bright colors adorning almost every article of clothing they sell, including its swimwear. So, when you want to feel like you’re on the ultimate tropical getaway, you can do no wrong with the beloved brand.

Price range: $$-$$$

Best for: Tropical prints and patterns

FARM Rio Printed Bikini Top

Now 17% Off

FARM Rio Jardin de Reve Bandeau Bikini Top

FARM Rio Flowers Leopards Halterneck Swimsuit

FARM Rio Garden Scarf Underwire One-Piece Swimsuit

Mikoh

For something that looks and feels like anything but basic and still feels chic, MIKOH is the brand for you. Its suits are perfect to mix and match, providing you with endless options for your getaway and beyond.

Price range: $$

Best for: Subtle styles

MIKOH Kaloko Bikini Top

MIKOH Copa Bikini Top

MIKOH Kea One Piece

MIKOH Loki Bikini Top

Peony

Environmentally friendly swimwear is at the heart of Peony’s feminine and flattering designs. With subtle patterns and styles, the swimsuits are both beautiful and sophisticated. They also pair well with the brand’s resort pieces, which makes it a stunning line worth checking out.

Price range: $$

Best for: Sophisticated selects

Peony Solstice Floral Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Peony Memoir Embroidered One-Piece Swimsuit

Now 25% Off

Peony Everlasting Triangle Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Peony Holiday Balconette Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Victoria’s Secret

Victoria’s Secret swimsuits have been a mainstay for good reason—and they just keep getting better. The brand’s latest styles incorporate trendy fabrics and modern silhouettes while still maintaining the same brand identity that shoppers have come to love.

Price range: $-$$

Best for: Faithful swimwear lovers

Victoria’s Secret Essential Monokini One-Piece Swimsuit

Victoria’s Secret VS Archives Essential Ruffled Halter Bikini Top

Victoria’s Secret Crinkle Racerback One-Piece Swimsuit

Victoria’s Secret Essential Plunge Bikini Top

Reina Olga

A favorite of ELLE.com senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong, Reina Olga is an Italian swimwear line with updated takes on traditional swimsuits. Born from an idea from sisters Guia and Isotta, the line is fun yet chic—the perfect combination for a swimsuit.

Price range: $$-$$$

Best for: Updated reinventions

Reina Olga La Volpe Bikini Set

Reina Olga Augusta Ribbed Cut-out Swimsuit

Reina Olga Laila Crinkle One-Piece Swimsuit

Reina Olga Triangle-Cup Bikini

Now 17% Off

Matteau

Known for its modern takes on timeless swimwear styles, Matteau’s suits are flattering, comfortable, and made to last. The brand, from founded by sisters Peta Heinsen and Ilona Hamer, also sells elevated, classic clothing perfect for pairing with its swimsuits on a warm vacation day.

Price range: $$-$$$

Best for: Modern minimalism

Matteau Black Tri Crop Bikini Top

Matteau Scoop-back One-piece Swimsuit

Matteau The String Floral-print Recycled Triangle Bikini Top

Matteau The Square Swimsuit

SAME

Founded in 2015 by Shea Marie, the California-based brand is known for its delicate and chic swimsuits. Often featuring details like stripes, rosettes, and other appliqués, these swimsuits know how to make a statement.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Floral appliqués and rosettes

SAME Spiral Halter One Piece

SAME Spiral Bikini Top

SAME Floral-Appliqué Swimsuit

SAME Layered Bikini Top

Oceanus

Harkening back to the maximalist glamour of the ’80s, Oceanus is all about jewels, gems, and bedazzlement. If you’re going out in the sun, you might as well sport something that shines, right? All items are made with environmentally friendly textiles with hand-embroidered Swarovski crystals. That’s swimwear you can brag about.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Beachy glitz and glamour

Oceanus Los Angeles Underwire Beaded Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Oceanus Alabama Embellished One-Piece Swimsuit

Now 25% Off

Oceanus Beatrix Sunburst 2-Piece Swim Skirt Set

Now 25% Off

Oceanus Heidi Beaded Underwire Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Zimmermann

It’s never too early to start collecting resort-ready swimwear. Zimmerman mastered the out-of-office aesthetic in its swim line, abundant with feminine florals, soft colors, and delicate crochet.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Vacation-worthy prints

Zimmermann Maxine Tie Detail Two-Piece Swimsuit

Zimmermann Tallow Lace Triangle Bikini

Zimmermann Maxine Paisley Belted Bandeau One-Piece Swimsuit

Zimmermann Acacia Floral Triangle Bikini Set

Frankies Bikinis

If you’re looking for an on-trend style, Frankies Bikinis is where it’s at. It ticks off all the Instagram-favorite hits like tie-dye, cloud prints, terry cloth, and more.

Price range: $$

Best for: Must-have swimsuit trends

Frankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Angel Bikini Top

Frankies Bikinis Juliet Cheeky One Piece Swimsuit

Frankies Bikinis x BELLA HADID Nick Triangle Bikini Top

Frankies Bikinis Cola Underwire Bikini Top

Oséree

Founded by Jannine Vinci and Isabella Cavalli in 2015, Oséree is an Italian swimwear brand that gets its name from the French verb “oser,” meaning “to dare.” Thus, it’s no surprise that sparkly maillots and two-pieces are the brand’s signatures. If your vibe skews “extra,” its fringy beaded styles are most definitely for you.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Glittery, shimmery moments

Oséree Rose-appliqué Bikini

Oséree Oséree Shade bikini set

Oséree Sporty Bra 90s Bikini

Oséree Striped Bikini

Aerie

Aerie makes some of the most flattering swimwear that never, ever falls off. Seriously, one can wipe out while surfing, and its two-piece bikinis somehow stay in place as you’re rocked by a huge wave.

Price range: $

Best for: Sporty, size-inclusive, comfortable (and affordable) pieces

Aerie Cloudweave Crochet Voop Bikini Top

Now 56% Off

Aerie The Boardwalker Ribbed Bikini Top

Now 25% Off

Aerie The Surfer One Piece Swimsuit

Now 25% Off

Aerie The Dipper Bikini Top

Now 46% Off

Bond-Eye

With a single-size sizing model (the brand’s technical fabric generally fits sizes from XS to L), Bond-Eye might not be for everyone. But those who are in the know know. The material is super flattering and ranges from chic neutrals to fun color-blocking that will make you feel like an ’80s Barbie in the best way possible.

Price range: $$

Best for: Punchy, flattering styles

Bond-Eye Indi Reversible Triangle Top

Bond-Eye Maxam One Piece

Bond-Eye Ring Scout Crop Crinkle Bikini Top

Bond-Eye Tie Back Blake Crinkle Bandeau Bikini Top

Now 51% Off

Missoni

A Missoni zigzag swimsuit is the Rolls-Royce of bikinis. Consider it the gold standard of luxury swimwear, not to mention an investment that will never go out of style. Seriously, these knit suits have been a staple since the ’60s.

Price range: $$$$

Best for: Colorful luxury

Missoni Chevron Bikini

Missoni Wavy Striped Tie-Back One-Piece Swimsuit

Missoni Zigzag-knit Bikini

Missoni Triangle Bikini

Lisa Marie Fernandez

Rihanna, Selena Gomez, and Beyoncé are just a few fans of Lisa Marie Fernandez’s gorgeous swimsuits. Its retro, yet undeniably modern cuts pair best with its elevated ready-to-wear collection, which includes bolero jackets and flowy dresses in matching prints.

Price range: $$$$

Best for: Celebrity-approved swimsuits

Lisa Marie Fernandez Striped Seersucker Balconette Two-Piece Swimsuit

Now 11% Off

Lisa Marie Fernandez Jasmine Neoprene Swimsuit

Lisa Marie Fernandez Black Jasmine Bikini

Lisa Marie Fernandez Tie-detailed Striped Seersucker Swimsuit

Hunza G

You might recognize Hunza G for the iconic cutout mini dress worn by Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman, but the London-based brand is on its way to being famous for its bathing suits, too. Relaunched under Georgiana Huddar, the ultra-flattering, super-stretchy styles look good on literally everyone. That’s kind of the point, too, since its one-size-fits-all swimsuits are intended to suit a range of bodies.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Ultra-comfortable and head-turning styles

Hunza G Pamela One Piece Swimsuit

Hunza G Judy Bikini

Hunza G Domino Embellished Seersucker Swimsuit

Hunza G Phoebe Metallic Seersucker Bikini

Good American

Since its launch in 2016, Good American has become a hub for great-fitting denim, easy basics, and swimwear. Think unexpected minimalist designs that hug you in all the right places, and true to the brand’s ethos, it’s all offered in an inclusive size range.

Price range: $$

Best for: Minimalist designs in extended sizing

Good American Gingham Balconette

Good American Cherry Square Neck Support One Piece

Good American Triangle Bikini Top in Blue

Good American Square Neck Compression Swim Top

JADE Swim

Minimalism does not mean boring when it comes to JADE Swim. Founded by Brittany Kozerski, a former fashion editor-turned-designer, the brand has fans like Kendall Jenner and Paloma Elsesser. The inventive silhouettes in luxurious Italian fabrics will age with you and check off all the sustainable boxes. Bonus: JADE Swim is made America, too.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Modern, minimalist pieces

JADE Swim Capri One Piece

JADE Swim Via Terry Bikini Top

JADE Swim Swim Nori One Piece

JADE Swim Eliza Bikini Top

Solid & Striped

Solid & Striped single-handedly resurrected the basic one-piece in 2014, but it has come a long, fashionable way since. These suits always have a touch of ’70s nostalgia without looking frumpy.

Price range: $$$

Best for: Classic one-pieces and poolside basics

Solid & Striped The Iris Reversible Triangle Bikini Top

Solid & Striped The Alma One Piece

Solid & Striped Ellery Bikini Top

Solid & Striped The Luela One-Piece Swimsuit

Additional Reporting by Dale Arden Chong, Meg Donohue, and Ashley Achenbach

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
